title: Admiring Anna
description: Working as an assistant to an artist who spends most of his time painting nudes has made sure Samantha doesn’t turn a hair at even the most beautiful naked woman, but Anna is something special. Samantha has been admiring Anna from afar for months. When she overhears Anna talking about a club catering for female dominants and their admirers, she can’t resist following her there. The only question now is whether or not her admiration will be returned…
author: Kim Dare
